word_mean: 蜗：任何呈螺旋形之物体
〔NA〕耳蜗：为主要的听觉器官，呈螺旋形(盘旋状)管，类似蜗牛壳，是组成内耳的一部分，基底部位于内耳道的外侧端，其顶端指向前外侧，耳蜗由蜗轴(骨性管)和骨性的螺旋板组成，它部分地将耳蜗分为听觉的重要器官——前庭阶和鼓阶

sentence.Network_en: In the present study, gradients of gentamicin along the cochlea were measured.
sentence.Network_cn: 在目前的研究之中, 可以测量庆大霉素沿着耳蜗的浓度梯度分布.

sentence.Network_en: Conclusion Radix panacis quinquefolii isn't evidence cochlea toxicity for guinea pig.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论高丽参对豚鼠无明显的耳毒性作用.

sentence.Network_en: The nerve cells of the cochlea then die and permanent deafness results.
sentence.Network_cn: 耳蜗神经元细胞就会死,导致耳聋.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 人体器官、组织中英文对照表_百度文库 ... 耳孔 ear canal 耳蜗 cochlea 耳咽管 Eustachian tube.
耳蜗管（cochlea）为哺乳动物所特有。从两栖类开始在球囊的末端产生瓶状囊，有感受声波的能力。
分享到哪里？蜗cochlea蜗部cochlea part

cochlea duct 耳蜗管cochlea ganglion 耳蜗神经节cochlea microphonic effect 耳蜗颤噪效应
耳蜗功能 cochlear function耳蜗电位 cochlea potential耳蜗内电位 endocochlear potential
...被镫骨底封闭,下方的孔为圆形,与耳蜗的起始部相接,称蜗窗,fenestra cochleae,活体时被第二鼓膜封闭,此膜对耳蜗内的外淋巴的波动具有缓冲作用,鼓室的上壁由颞骨.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (used to denote spiral objects such as a spiral staircase and an Archimedean screw): from Latin, snail shell or screw', from Greek kokhlias. The current sense dates from the late 17th cent

entry.def: The cochlea is the spiral-shaped part of the inner ear.

means.word_mean: 1. the snail-shaped tube (in the inner ear coiled around the modiolus) where sound vibrations are converted into nerve impulses by the Organ of Corti
